Ogige Alfred Rewane bụ ogige ahịhịa ndụ ọha na eze n'okporo ụzọ Alfred Rewane na Ikoyi na Lagos

Ogige ahụ nke Gọọmentị Steeti Lagos mepụtara n'afọ 2018 dị n'ala nke  square mita puku itoolu na otu narị site na Osborne junction site na Lugard Avenue ruo NNPC ma kpọọ ya aha onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria nwụrụ n'abalị isii nke ọnwa October , afọ 1995. Ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ meghere maka ndị bi n'ime na ọkara gburugburu  nke ogige ahụ iji zuru ike, ma legherie anya okporo ụzọ Alfred Rewane.
